name: StationaryOxygenTherapyDevice
title: Stationary Oxygen Therapy Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Oxygen therapy devices for home use designed to remain in one place while operating.),(Data Element Scope: Stationary oxygen therapy devices accepted by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid as valid for home use.),(Inclusion Criteria: Oxygen therapy devices for home use designed to allow remain in one place while operating.),(Exclusion Criteria: Oxygen therapy devices for home use designed to allow a change in location while operating.)

contains.display: Stationary compressed gaseous oxygen system, rental; includes container, contents, regulator, flowmeter, humidifier, nebulizer, cannula or mask, and tubing
Stationary liquid oxygen system, rental; includes container, contents, regulator, flowmeter, humidifier, nebulizer, cannula or mask, & tubing
Stationary oxygen contents, gaseous, 1 month's supply = 1 unit
Stationary oxygen contents, liquid, 1 month's supply = 1 unit
Oxygen concentrator, single delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate
Oxygen concentrator, dual delivery port, capable of delivering 85 percent or greater oxygen concentration at the prescribed flow rate, each
